channel.title: [PI]Quest adding problem

item.title: [PI]Quest adding problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:426644”] sendFrame126(To start, I must speak to Sir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147); sendFrame126("floor of the White Knights' Castle in central Falador.", 8148); sendFrame126(He can be found on the West side of the castle.", 8149);
is incorrect.

sendFrame126("To start, I must speak to Sir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147); sendFrame126("floor of the White Knights' Castle in central Falador.", 8148); sendFrame126("He can be found on the West side of the castle.", 8149);[/quote]
Oh I see, the quotations. I forgot, thanks alot.

Now I get this:

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:20: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method clearQuestInterface()
location: class server.model.players.Client
                        c.clearQuestInterface();
                         ^
src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:24: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable playerquest1
location: class server.model.players.Client
if(c.playerquest1 == 0){
    ^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:79: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable playerquest1
location: class server.model.players.Client
                                                p.playerquest1 = Integer.parseIn
t(token2);
                                                 ^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:238: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable playerquest1
location: class server.model.players.Client
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerquest1), 0,
 Integer.toString(p.playerquest1).length());
                                                              ^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:238: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable playerquest1
location: class server.model.players.Client
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerquest1), 0,
 Integer.toString(p.playerquest1).length());

                   ^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

From adding in playersave this:

			characterfile.write("character-quest1 = ", 0, 19);
			characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerquest1), 0, Integer.toString(p.playerquest1).length());
			characterfile.newLine();

and

					} else if (token.equals("character-quest1")) {
						p.playerquest1 = Integer.parseInt(token2);

also 2 errors for adding the code originally:

        public void quest1() {
                        c.clearQuestInterface();
                        for(int i = 0; i < 512; i++) {
                        if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null)  {
                                if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName != "null")
if(c.playerquest1 == 0){

The top part of the method.

item.title: [PI]Quest adding problem
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

sendFrame126(To start, I must speak to Sir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147); sendFrame126("floor of the White Knights' Castle in central Falador.", 8148); sendFrame126(He can be found on the West side of the castle.", 8149);
is incorrect.

sendFrame126("To start, I must speak to Sir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147); sendFrame126("floor of the White Knights' Castle in central Falador.", 8148); sendFrame126("He can be found on the West side of the castle.", 8149);

item.title: [PI]Quest adding problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I have added in playerassistant.java:

	public void quest1() {
			c.clearQuestInterface();
			for(int i = 0; i < 512; i++) {
			if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null)  {
				if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName != "null") 
if(c.playerquest1 == 0){
					sendFrame126("Black Knights' Fortress", 8144);  //Title
					sendFrame126(To start, I must speak to Sir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147);
					sendFrame126(floor of the White Knights' Castle in central Falador.", 8148);
					sendFrame126(He can be found on the West side of the castle.", 8149);
				} 
			}

and I got this problem:

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:26: ')' expected

ir Amik Varze on the 2nd floor,", 8147);
